nodes.text: Tallie Torchers was a squadron of RZ-2 A-wing interceptors that served in the Starfighter Corps of the Resistance under the command of Resistance pilot Tallissan Lintra during the Cold War. The squadron notably took part in various missions against pirates in the Cassander sector. Previously flying under a different name, this squadron was renamed Tallie Torchers not long before the battle of Exegol and flew hit-and-run missions from the Resistance base on Ajan Kloss.
